source_objects.title: Management
source_objects.description: Take your management skills to the next level with these course in negotiation, leadership, people management and more.

items.title: PMP Review -Q & A - PMBOK 6th Edition
items.headline: Real Exam Questions
objectives_summary: How To Pass PMP Exam

items.title: The swiss army knife of team motivation
items.headline: All the tools and suport you will need to a motivated team.
objectives_summary: Everything you need to turn ideas in to an actionable plan to improve your teams motivation
The course will guide you to remove complexity and do the first small but measurable positive changes to improve your team’s motivation within one month.
You will be able to lay the ground as to apply cutting edge team science to your team

items.title: PMO-CP simulation exams
items.headline: Pass the project management office certified practitioner (PMO-CP) from the first attempt
objectives_summary: Pass the PMO-CP exam from the first attempt by practicing all sets of tests and obtaining 75% and above!

items.title: How to get a Graduate Job and into a Leadership Scheme!
items.headline: Includes a comprehensive 45,000 word E-BOOK GUIDE!
objectives_summary: You will learn the comprehensive journey of passing a graduate scheme.
You will understand the features of a graduate or leadership scheme.
You will learn how to approach the initial application process, including the CV and the Cover Letter.

How ISO 19650 is relevant to you and your organisation

items.title: How to Manage Sales Teams
items.headline: Great Managers Make Great Sales People
objectives_summary: Sales Managers

items.title: The Innovation Masterclass - Creating an Innovation Culture
items.headline: Why your organisation needs to innovate and how you can get started
objectives_summary: The definition of innovation
Why organisations need to be innovative now more than ever
The four main areas organisations can innovate in

items.title: Managing Hispanic Employees
items.headline: Easy Lessons to Improve Productivity and Retention
objectives_summary: In this course, learn how to increase productivity and improve relations with the Hispanic employees you manage.
Cultural competency lessons will equip you to improve retention rates and encourage workers to reach their full potential.
Actionable points applicable to the workplace will provide you with some practical ideas for implementing your new knowledge.

items.headline: Risk Management Professional (RMP) Exam Preparatory Course
objectives_summary: After successfully completing this course, the students shall be able to:
Identify and learn the difference between a negative and positive risk
Develop and implement a risk management plan

items.title: Operations Management - Resource & Workout Layout
items.headline: Learn The Principle of Operations Management
objectives_summary: In this course you will gain a high-level understanding of the operations fundamental which includes efficiency vs. effectiveness, operational strategies and system view of operations
In this course you will learn to analyse and evaluate theoretical and practical knowledge of the operations of process design and capacity management to develop solutions
In this course you will learn to analyse and evaluate the principles of work flow organisation to design a short-term operational plan to meet demand

items.title: How to Start and Grow a Successful Cleaning Business
items.headline: Master the fundamentals of house, office, & commercial cleaning and build a successful career in cleaning business.
objectives_summary: Get introductory idea on cleaning job and the diversity of the cleaning jobs
Acquire knowledge about cleaning equipment, products and clothing
Familiarize with chemical safety, keyholding and alarm codes for cleaners

items.headline: Move up the Ladder, Career Management, Networking, Manage Your Boss, Interview Skills, Management Skills, Leadership
objectives_summary: How to gain promotion at work.
How to move up the career ladder
When to move up, move across or move out.

items.title: Sports Business & Marketing - Land Your First Job In Sport

visible_instructors.job_title: Learn From Leading Sports Marketing Experts
visible_instructors.name: Sport
visible_instructors.title: Sport Calling

items.headline: The ultimate guide to Kick starting your sports business & marketing career
objectives_summary: How to make a break into your dream career in the sport business industry.
Have a detailed understanding of the sport business industry – who’s in it, how it operates and what each of the key disciplines are.
Be able to make an informed decision on your future in sport - knowing what discipline and roles are right for you.
